lyric.verse: Te wo sebaseba Sono kamini Tsuno wo togeba Todokisoo Nejiruyoo ni Tsukamiete Tobitsuru made Me wo akete Dereka wa kara? Wakaru deshoo?
lyric.chorus: Tadoritsuke bakitto Misete ageruwa Saibo made matataku Warui yume Kojiaketa kuchibiru Afureru gurai Taretagashita ai wo Tsumekonde Usoni wabatsu wo Tsukimi wa kiba wo Anata ni mukui wo
lyric.verse: Wareta yoru ni Kamaitachi Ringo no ki ni Uta wo horu Museruyoo na Kemono michi Awarino mai Mayoomichi Furueru deshoo? Kurushii deshoo?
lyric.chorus: Iki wo kesurina kara Saa nigenasai Yamigatsutzukukabiru Mogaku hoshi Sono ashi wo tsutatte Afurekurai Oboreru hodo akai Fukidamari Kizuni wa ame wo Hata ni wa doku wo Watashi ni yaiba wo Uso ni habatsu wo Tsuki ni wakiba wo Anata ni mukui wo

translator.translatorname: Mika Arita, Kazu 'Omi' Kajihara, Marcelluss D. Nealy

lyric.verse: If I hold out my hands, If I sharepen my nail, I am about to reach your hair Wrench me and grasp me Keep opening your eyes until I scatter myself Do you recognize me? Do you understand who I am?
lyric.chorus: If you could reach there, I will show you the nightmare that keeps winking till the end I will pry open your closed lips and stuff them with the discharged love Till it flows up Punishment for the lies Fangs for the moon And the reward to you
lyric.verse: Unnoticed scar on my fingers in the cracked open night Kamaitachi carves the poetry on the apple tree Choking animal trail Wandering path with no end You must be shivering You must be suffering
lyric.chorus: Go, run away scraping your breath As long as the darkness stays The star keeps struggling Tangled memory all along my legs is drowning in the red drift Rain for the wound Poison for the flower The Fang for me Punishment for the lies Fangs for the moon And the reward to you
